{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13000v1", "title": "Tree-Line graphs and their quantum walks", "summary": "For a simple graph $\Gamma$, a (bipartite)tree-line graph and a tree-graph of
$\Gamma$ can be defined. With a (bipartite)tree-line graph constructed by the
function $(b)\ell$, we study the continuous quantum walk on $(b)\ell ^n
\Gamma$. An equitable partition of a bipartite tree-line graph is obtained by
its corresponding derived tree graph. This paper also examines quantum walks on
derived graphs, whose vertices represent their basis state.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-17T15:10:49Z"}
